timeline.bodyText: We should probably use a random port here - to avoid any clashes with other tests. Also, is this strictly a unit test, or an integration test?
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze

timeline.bodyText: Let's not use the author's name as test data. Let's stick with Baeldung
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze

timeline.bodyText: Consider using https://www.baeldung.com/junit-5-temporary-directory here for a temp dir, rather then Files.createTempFile unless it's Files.createTempFile we're demoing!
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze

timeline.bodyText: Same here with the my name as test data
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze

timeline.bodyText: Do we need @Nonnull var - can we not just go String::toUpperCase ?
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze
ashleyfrieze
